titleStmt.title: A breif [sic] enquiry into the ground, authority, and rights, of ecclesiastical synods; upon the principles of Scripture and right reason occasion'd by a late book, intitul'd, Municipium ecclesiasticum: &c.
titleStmt.author: Hill, Samuel, 1648-1716.
Hill, Samuel, 1648-1716. Municipium ecclesiasticum, or, The rights, liberties, and authorities of the Christian church.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.B. for Richard Sare, at Gray's-Inn-Gate, in Holbourn,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Samuel Hill by Wing.
Reproduction of original in: Trinity College Library, Dublin, Ireland.
